comment: Version of ~ bj-rexcom4b with a disjoint variable condition on ` x , V ` , hence removing dependency on ~ df-sb and ~ df-clab (so that it depends on ~ df-clel and ~ df-rex only on top of first-order logic). Prefer its use over ~ bj-rexcom4b when sufficient (in particular when ` V ` is substituted for ` _V ` ). (Contributed by BJ, 14-Sep-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
